name: AIA_RULE_DynamicOperatorDropdown
description: Dropdown component to select operators based on a data type (int, decimal, date, etc.)
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!operators: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!dataTypeId),
    rule!AIA_RULE_ENUM_Operators(),
    reject(
      fn!isnull,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AIA_RULE_ENUM_Operators(),
        if(
          contains(tointeger(fv!item.validTypes), ri!dataTypeId),
          fv!item,
          null
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    choiceLabels: index(local!operators, "label", null),
    choiceValues: local!operators,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: "Select an operator",
    value: displayvalue(
      ri!value,
      index(local!operators, "operator", null),
      local!operators,
      null
    ),
    saveInto: {
      a!save(
        ri!saveInto,
        save!value.operator
      )
    },
    searchDisplay: ri!searchDisplay,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: ri!required,
    requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: ri!validations,
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)
